oai_dc:dc.dc:title: You don’t have to look for this building, from the Nashville Times, 1940
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A published photo from the Nashville Times (1940), about the Seventh Avenue Garage. Cited in the 1941 City Directory as “South’s Finest One Stop Service Garage, 600 car capacity, gas, oil, tires and tubes, brake work our specialty, park inside, 15 cents to 25 cents all day, 145-149 7th Av. N.” Forms part of the Nashville Times newspaper collection. 1 digital photo.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Seventh Avenue Garage (Nashville, Tenn.)
